package.name: NextAlarmSX闹钟优化-Rootless
package.shortDescription: An add-on to SleeperX that will display the next alarm on the lock screen and the time until an alarm will fire within the Clock application.一款闹钟优化插件，需要配合sleeper插件使用！暂无汉化，因为源主没精力，可以耐心等待更新！
